question: 紅茶
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>deep red</kanji> <kanji>tea</kanji> isn't a deep red tea... it's a <vocabulary>black tea</vocabulary>. If you think about it, a lot of black tea is really deep red, which is why a deep red tea is a black tea instead.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
